results.text: armi sanda i$elli yiîij. Iufa i$elli $ef tala ilu$en. Iufa n $uôes agdud. Nenna: "a Bu sin wacciwen, âaqeb iten, ne$ lhu $uôsen".
Inna: "win idensen a t nâaqeb, sinna, ad iu$al ar Mass is at Iâaqeb aâaqeb unekkaô.
Wanag i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, akafi igerzen. Ad as Nini i isehlen si lameô nne£".
Sinna, ilêa d yiwen n ubrid,
armi sanda d ineqqeô yiîij. Iufa n ineqqeô ed $ef ugdud, iwumi ur Nefki ar at isdarin segs.
Am akka. Ni$ ibbwev a£ d akw usali s.
